# province id = rotation in degrees, 0 is pointing right, then ccw)
# can be reloaded ingame by cmd: reloadtradewinds

# North Atlantic Westerlies


# Atlantic Northeasterlies

# 0 East
# 90 South
# 180 West
# 270 North
  
# -90 North

# 0 pointing right, +10 moving counter-clockwise, -10 moving clockwise.
